short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab page with inspirational quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock a world of inspiration with every new tab! 

Good Quotes chrome extension designed to brighten your day and boost your productivity. Each time you open a new tab, be greeted with a carefully selected, uplifting quote that sparks positivity and motivation. Our vast collection of quotes ranges from timeless wisdom of historical figures to insightful words from contemporary thought leaders.

Whether you need a morning pick-me-up, a midday motivation boost, or an evening dose of reflection, Good Quotes turns every new tab into an opportunity for inspiration and embraces the minimalistic design. Stay motivated, stay inspired, stay productive!

Update:
Now supports dark mode.
